text: The men's C-2 1000 metres canoeing event at the 2019 Pan American Games was held on 27th of July at the Albufera Medio Mundo in the city of Huacho. ==Results== ===Final=== {|class="wikitable" width=50% style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !Athletes !Country !Time |- | |align=left|Serguey Torres Fernando Jorge |align=left| |3:32.276 |- | |align=left|Craig Spence Drew Hodges |align=left| |3:35.646 |- | |align=left|Guillermo Quirino Rigoberto Camilo |align=left| |3:37.726 |- |4 |align=left|Edward Paredes Jose Solano |align=left| |3:56.523 |- |5 |align=left|Daniel Leon Cristhian Sola |align=left| |4:21.378 |- | – |align=left|Erlon de Souza Silva Isaquias Queiroz |align=left| |DNF |} ==References== ==External links== *Results Category:Canoeing at the 2019 Pan American Games
title: Canoeing at the 2019 Pan American Games – Men's C-2 1000 metres
